extendedInfo.description: We are a truly independent funeral director based in Addiscombe, Croydon, Surrey. We offer a professional and caring service with dignity, understanding and guidance. When someone dies there are many decisions and arrangements to be made at a time of personal distress. No one can show or know what you are going through, but in a caring way we would like to advise you on some of the practical necessities that must be performed at this trying time. App Features; - Helpful advice and information for when you are dealing with bereavement. - To Do List to help you keep track of your funeral arrangements and tasks. - List of Funerals being held by Rowland Brothers. - Make Donations in memory of the deceased. - Purchase flowers. - Get in touch via phone, email or get directions for a visit. - Share the App with your contacts.Keywords: A&J Morriss & Son, Funeral Directors, Death, Croydon, LondonSupport URL: http://appitized.com/contact-us
